mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.CO_PERSONAL_ID as coPersonalId, a.TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY as taxResidenceCountry, a.TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER as taxResidenceIdCardNumber, a.NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER as noTaxIdentificationNumber, a.DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER as differentRegistrationNumber, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CO_PERSONAL_ID , TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY , TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER , NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{coPersonalId} , #{taxResidenceCountry} , #{taxResidenceIdCardNumber} , #{noTaxIdentificationNumber} , #{differentRegistrationNumber} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
CO_PERSONAL_ID ,
TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY ,
TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER ,
NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER ,
DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{coPersonalId} ,
#{taxResidenceCountry} ,
#{taxResidenceIdCardNumber} ,
#{noTaxIdentificationNumber} ,
#{differentRegistrationNumber} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{coPersonalId} ,
TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY = #{taxResidenceCountry} ,
TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER = #{taxResidenceIdCardNumber} ,
NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = #{noTaxIdentificationNumber} ,
DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER = #{differentRegistrationNumber} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CO_PERSONAL_ID, TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY , TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER , NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.coPersonalId}, #{item.taxResidenceCountry} , #{item.taxResidenceIdCardNumber} , #{item.noTaxIdentificationNumber} , #{item.differentRegistrationNumber} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{item.coPersonalId}, TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY = #{item.taxResidenceCountry} , TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER = #{item.taxResidenceIdCardNumber} , NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = #{item.noTaxIdentificationNumber} , DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER = #{item.differentRegistrationNumber} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{coPersonalId}, TAX_RESIDENCE_COUNTRY = #{taxResidenceCountry} , TAX_RESIDENCE_ID_CARD_NUMBER = #{taxResidenceIdCardNumber} , NO_TAX_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = #{noTaxIdentificationNumber} , DIFFERENT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER = #{differentRegistrationNumber} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_CO_TAXES a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
